name: BOLSOGAME
description:
Quanto tempo você consegue aguentar o Bolsonaro falando? Teste sua paciência contra algumas de suas manifestações de homofobia, misoginia, racismo e pura ignorância.

For those who didn't understand: Bolsonaro is a fascist politician from Brazil, now disputing presidency. Bolsonaro is know for his public manifestations of racism, homofobia and misogyny, and also for actively combating movements for minorities and human rights. He defends the Brazilian military dictatorship and acts of torture and police brutality.
